meanings.definition: A decision made as part of a larger decision-making process.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, we reached a subdecision about the budget.
meanings.sent2: It is important to consider every subdecision before finalizing the plan.
meanings.sent3: The subdecision to order pizza for lunch was met with cheers from the team.
meanings.sent4: Each subdecision is like a puzzle piece that fits into the bigger picture.
meanings.sent5: The subdecision to wear a hat on a sunny day saved her from getting a sunburn.

meanings.definition: To make a decision that is a smaller part of a larger decision.
meanings.sent1: She will subdecision on the color of the walls before choosing furniture.
meanings.sent2: Remember to subdecision on each aspect of the project separately.
meanings.sent3: He tends to subdecision on what to eat for breakfast, then changes his mind.
meanings.sent4: Subdecisioning on which route to take, she finally decided to follow the map.
meanings.sent5: The team will subdecision on the logo design before moving on to other tasks.
